snippet.title: Sega Genesis / Mega Drive-Longplay-Uwol - Quest For Money HD (U)
snippet.description:
Played by: JohnX895 

Uwol, Quest for Money is a platform game for the ZX Spectrum 128K developed by the Mojon Twins in 2009. Released under the Ubhres Productions label, distributed free of charge.
   The game supports the Extended ulaplus palette. The game code is written in C using the splib2 library. The ay-3-8910 uses a player developed by WYZ to play audio. The aPPack data unpacker is also used. The source code of the game is freely available.
   In 2010, the game was ported to the Sega Mega Drive (Shiru) and Commodore 64 (Wood). In 2013, the Sega Mega Drive version was ported to ATM Turbo 2 (with AY music from the original version or TurboSound FM music from the Sega version to choose from).
